applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allow the app to read or write items in all external datasets that the app is authorized to access
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items in external datasets

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all hidden memberships

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all company places

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read organization information

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write organization information

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all directory RBAC settings

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all directory RBAC settings

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections (preview)

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write feature rollout policies without a signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write feature rollout policies

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read basic mail properties in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Includes all properties except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read basic mail in all mailboxes

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read basic mail properties in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Includes all properties except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read basic mail in all mailboxes

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users' tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read and write all users' tasks and tasklists

applicationScopesList.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all users' tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.
applicationScopesList.consentDisplayName: Read all users' tasks and tasklist
